name: Arm Gun Simulator
description:
You will find yourself in a western saloon and will have to survive by being a fast and precise shooter! Load your gun and shoot your opponent to defend yourself and survive in this standoff! Start with easy opponents, train your arm directing skills and become the fastest cowboy in this town!

Arm Gun Simulator features:
• Amazingly realistic and intuitive hand controls
• Various unlockable handgun models and numerous attachments to help you shoot more precisely
• Several difficulty levels to practice and challenge your skills
• Atmospheric surroundings of a western saloon that will make you feel like a real cowboy

Don’t sit still, or you’ll become a target practice for your opponent! Download Arm Gun Simulator and prove that you’re not a target dummy!
